summary: A samurai with a high skill in chess makes friends with Zatoichi, who finds that things become peculiar in his presence.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Mikio Narita|Chizu Hayashi|Kaneko Iwasaki|Gaku Yamamoto|Saburô Date|Tatsuo Endô|Takuya Fujioka|Naoko Fujiyama|Ryutaro Gomi|Ryô Horikawa|Kanae Kobayashi|Keiko Koyanagi|Tarô Marui|Fujio Suga|Rokkô Toura|Ichirô Yamamoto
title: Zatôichi jigoku tabi
